title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, the 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options are not always available in the Navigator menu.
EB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, either both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2
2. Select project P2
3. Close project P2
